sentences: Massimo Savić (born 6 June 1962), also known simply as Massimo, is a Croatian pop singer.
He first became popular in the 1980s with his band "Dorian Gray", and then soon embarked on a successful solo career.
He won five Porin awards for best male vocal performance, 2004–2007, and in 2012.
In 2013, Massimo's thirty-year anniversary concert sold out the Pula Arena.
with Dorian Gray – Sjaj u tami, Jugoton, 1983
